comments.author: Campfool
comments.message:
At least in the past year the 5v non-addressable RGB strips w/remotes have become very common and cheap, to the horror of my neighbors who think I've lost my mind. Since getting rid of my car and going bike-only, there are times I have to ride at night.
My biggest fear was car drivers not seeing me as I peddled my grocery-filled bike-trailer home, but no more. Now, thanks to LEDs, I look like the Devil's Monument scene from Close Encounters of the 3rd Kind!
